name: TONK hover tank game
description: hover tank prototype made with unity 1 month on and off development. will be updated soon as all the base features are there, and it is in active development. the damage system is quite advanced and you can disable parts of the enemy tank and it will be refined in the future. ai changes, graphics improvement and an end goal will be added. feel free to ask any questions. an updated version will be released in a week or so
